short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online Photobooth with filters and insta-sharing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using Seenly you can easily take awesome looking photos with your webcam.

Play around with one of the many filters, and share your photos directly on Facebook, Twitter, by email or using a direct link.

... or choose to keep your photos secret ;-)
